name: Muhammed Rebin
bio: Software Developer | Python Django Full Stack Developer

CollabX.summary: The repository CollabX has seen significant development activity over the past two weeks. Recent updates include adding views and templates for brand dashboard, creator list and detail, and campaign listing. Creator profile creation, proposal data model, campaign forms with validation, and user model updates have been implemented. Custom authentication backend with email and phone, as well as social authentication and OTP verification, have also been added.

Vesture.link: https://github.com/rebin03/Vestone is not available however using Vesture
Vesture.summary: Vesture has received updates to its authentication system, including the addition of Google signin and signup using Django allauth. Custom authentication using email or phone number has also been implemented, alongside updates to the register and signin page.

expense-manager.summary: The expense-manager repository has seen updates to its authentication system, switching to token authentication. API endpoints for creating, listing, updating, viewing, and deleting expenses have been added.

profile_summary:
Muhammed Rebin is a seasoned software developer with a strong foundation in multiple programming languages, including Python, C++, and JavaScript. As a skilled full-stack developer with expertise in Python Django, he excels at designing, developing, and deploying scalable and efficient software solutions. With a strong track record of delivering high-quality projects, Muhammed has earned a reputation as a reliable and innovative professional in the field of software development.

With a substantial portfolio of 21 public repositories and a growing network of 17 followers, Muhammed consistently demonstrates his technical prowess and commitment to staying at the forefront of industry trends. As a dedicated software developer, he remains focused on leveraging his expertise to drive business growth, improve processes, and deliver exceptional results. Muhammed's unique blend of technical skills, creative problem-solving, and collaborative mindset makes him an invaluable asset to any project or organization.
